DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effectiveness SI-614 solution compare placebo solution treat patient dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy SI-614 Ophthalmic Solution Patients With Dry Eye .
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year age Have provide write informed consent Have dry eye eye Use contact lens Have uncontrolled systemic disease Have uncontrolled psychiatric condition , substance alcohol abuse Women pregnant , nurse planning pregnancy
